name: Ball Chuck 3D (Early Access)
description:
Experience the intense Ball Chucking experience and you play as a boy named Jr on a quest to become the Ball Chucking Champ! 

Controls:

Move: WASD

Pick Up/Throw: Right Mouse Button

Look Around: Mouse

Reset Balls: R

Good Luck Chucking Balls! 

(NOTE Ball Chuck is made for laughs, this means It's A Buggy and Glitched Game intentionally. Also This Is Our First Game Also The FINAL game will be $1)
